option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# System Architecture Diagram
``` ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ STUDENT MANAGEMENT SYSTEM │ │ Architecture │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ 1. CLIENT LAYER (Frontend - Browser/Postman/App) │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ - Sends HTTP requests (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE) │ │ - Includes JWT token in header: "Authorization: Bearer <token>" │ │ - Receives JSON responses │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ ↓ ↑ HTTP Request/Response ↓ ↑ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ 2. DJANGO SERVER LAYER (http://127.0.0.1:8000) │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ │ │ ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ URL ROUTING (StudentManagementSystem/urls.py) │ │ │ │ - Matches URL patterns to views │ │ │ │ - /admin/ → Admin panel │ │ │ │ - / → students.urls (includes all student app URLs) │ │ │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ↓ │ │ ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ MIDDLEWARE (settings.py) │ │ │ │ - Security checks │ │ │ │ - Session management │ │ │ │ - CSRF protection │ │ │ │ - Authentication │ │ │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ↓ │ │ ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ AUTHENTICATION (REST Framework + Simple JWT) │ │ │ │ - JWTAuthentication: Validates Bearer tokens │ │ │ │ - SessionAuthentication: Cookie-based auth │ │ │ │ - Token lifetime: 1 hour (access), 7 days (refresh) │ │ │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ↓ │ │ ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ VIEWS LAYER (students/views.py) │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ AUTHENTICATION VIEWS │ │ │ │ │ │ - register_student() → Create student account │ │ │ │ │ │ - register_teacher() → Create teacher account │ │ │ │ │ │ - user_login() → Session-based login │ │ │ │ │ │ - user_logout() → Logout │ │ │ │ │ │ - TokenObtainPairView → Get JWT tokens │ │ │ │ │ │ - TokenRefreshView → Refresh expired token │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ STUDENT MANAGEMENT VIEWS │ │ │ │ │ │ - get_students() → List all students │ │ │ │ │ │ - add_student() → Create new student │ │ │ │ │ │ - update_student() → Update student info │ │ │ │ │ │ - delete_student() → Delete student │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ ENROLLMENT VIEWS │ │ │ │ │ │ - student_request_enrollment() → Student requests │ │ │ │ │ │ - teacher_pending_requests() → View pending requests │ │ │ │ │ │ - teacher_approve_request() → Approve request │ │ │ │ │ │ - teacher_reject_request() → Reject request │ │ │ │ │ │ - teacher_enroll_student() → Direct enrollment │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ TEACHER MANAGEMENT VIEWS │ │ │ │ │ │ - teacher_course_students() → View enrolled students│ │ │ │ │ │ - teacher_update_grade() → Assign/update grades │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ↓ │ │ ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ SERIALIZERS (students/serializers.py) │ │ │ │ - Convert Python objects ↔ JSON │ │ │ │ - Validate input data │ │ │ │ - StudentSerializer, TeacherSerializer, etc. │ │ │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ↓ │ │ ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ MODELS (students/models.py) - Business Logic │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ User (Django built-in) │ │ │ │ │ │ - username, email, password (hashed) │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ Student │ │ │ │ │ │ - OneToOne → User │ │ │ │ │ │ - first_name, last_name, age, gpa │ │ │ │ │ │ - ManyToMany → Course (through Enrollment) │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ Teacher │ │ │ │ │ │ - OneToOne → User │ │ │ │ │ │ - first_name, last_name, subject │ │ │ │ │ │ - ManyToMany → Course │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ Course │ │ │ │ │ │ - name, code (unique), description, credits │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ Enrollment │ │ │ │ │ │ - student, course (unique together) │ │ │ │ │ │ - enrolled_by (teacher), enrollment_date, grade │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ │ ┌────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ │ │ EnrollmentRequest │ │ │ │ │ │ - student, course (unique together) │ │ │ │ │ │ - status (pending/approved/rejected) │ │ │ │ │ │ - reviewed_by (teacher), reviewed_at, notes │ │ │ │ │ └────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ↓ │ │ ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ DJANGO ORM (Object-Relational Mapping) │ │ │ │ - Translates Python code to SQL queries │ │ │ │ - Student.objects.all() → SELECT * FROM students_student │ │ │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ ↓ ↑ SQL Queries ↓ ↑ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ 3. DATABASE LAYER (PostgreSQL) │ ├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ Database: StudentSystem │ │ Host: localhost:5432 │ │ │ │ Tables: │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ auth_user │ │ │ │ - id, username, email, password (hashed), is_staff │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ students_student │ │ │ │ - id, user_id (FK), first_name, last_name, age, gpa │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ students_teacher │ │ │ │ - id, user_id (FK), first_name, last_name, subject │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ students_course │ │ │ │ - id, name, code, description, credits │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ students_enrollment │ │ │ │ - id, student_id (FK), course_id (FK), enrolled_by (FK), │ │ │ │ enrollment_date, grade │ │ │ │ - UNIQUE(student_id, course_id) │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ students_enrollmentrequest │ │ │ │ - id, student_id (FK), course_id (FK), status, │ │ │ │ requested_at, reviewed_by (FK), reviewed_at, notes │ │ │ │ - UNIQUE(student_id, course_id) │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ │ ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ │ │ students_teacher_courses (Many-to-Many join table) │ │ │ │ - teacher_id (FK), course_id (FK) │ │ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘ │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ DATA FLOW EXAMPLES ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
Example 1: STUDENT REGISTRATION ──────────────────────────────── 1. Client → POST /auth/register/student/ Body: {username, email, password, first_name, last_name, age, gpa}
2. Django → students.views.register_student()
3. View creates: a) User object (username, email, hashed password) b) Student object (linked to User, with student details)
4. Django ORM → SQL: INSERT INTO auth_user... INSERT INTO students_student...
5. PostgreSQL → Saves data
6. Django → Returns JSON: {message, student_id, user_id}
7. Client ← Receives response
Example 2: JWT LOGIN ──────────────────── 1. Client → POST /auth/token/ Body: {username, password}
2. Django → TokenObtainPairView (Simple JWT)
3. Validates credentials against database
4. Generates JWT tokens (access + refresh)
5. Client ← Receives: {access: "eyJ...", refresh: "eyJ..."}
6. Client saves tokens
7. For future requests: Client → Headers: {Authorization: "Bearer eyJ..."} Django → Validates token → Identifies user
Example 3: ENROLLMENT REQUEST FLOW ─────────────────────────────────── 1. Student → POST /enrollment/request/ Body: {student_id: 5, course_id: 2, notes: "..."}
2. Django → student_request_enrollment()
3. Creates EnrollmentRequest: - student = Student(id=5) - course = Course(id=2) - status = 'pending' - requested_at = now()
4. PostgreSQL → Saves to students_enrollmentrequest
5. Teacher → GET /teacher/requests/1/
6. Django → teacher_pending_requests() - Filters requests by teacher's courses - status = 'pending'
7. Teacher sees request list
8. Teacher → POST /teacher/request/1/approve/ Body: {teacher_id: 1}
9. Django → teacher_approve_request() - Updates request: status = 'approved', reviewed_by = teacher - Creates Enrollment: student + course + enrolled_by
10. PostgreSQL → Updates students_enrollmentrequest Inserts into students_enrollment
11. Student is now enrolled!
Example 4: TEACHER PERMISSIONS CHECK ───────────────────────────────────── 1. Teacher → POST /teacher/request/5/approve/ Body: {teacher_id: 1}
2. Django → teacher_approve_request()
3. Gets request: request = EnrollmentRequest(id=5) request.course = Course "Advanced Math"
4. Gets teacher: teacher = Teacher(id=1) teacher.courses = [Course "CS101", Course "CS102"]
5. Permission check: if request.course not in teacher.courses.all(): return JsonResponse({error: ...}, status=403)
6. Course "Advanced Math" NOT in teacher's courses
7. Client ← 403 Forbidden: "Teacher does not teach this course"
✅ Permission system working!
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ KEY CONCEPTS EXPLAINED ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
1. JWT (JSON Web Tokens) ┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ Token Structure: xxxxx.yyyyy.zzzzz │ │ │ │ │ │ │ Header Payload Signature │ │ │ │ Payload contains: │ │ - user_id: 5 │ │ - username: "john_doe" │ │ - exp: 1701532800 (expiration timestamp) │ │ │ │ Benefits: │ │ ✓ Stateless (no server-side sessions) │ │ ✓ Scalable (works across multiple servers) │ │ ✓ Secure (signed with secret key) │ │ ✓ Self-contained (all info in token) │ └─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
2. One-to-One Relationship (User ↔ Student) ┌─────────────┐ ┌──────────────┐ │ auth_user │ │students_ │ │ │ │student │ │ id: 1 │◄───────────────│ user_id: 1 │ │ username │ OneToOne │ first_name │ │ email │ │ last_name │ │ password │ │ age, gpa │ └─────────────┘ └──────────────┘
Each Student has exactly ONE User account Each User can have at most ONE Student profile
3. Many-to-Many Relationship (Teacher ↔ Course) ┌──────────┐ ┌─────────────────┐ ┌─────────┐ │ Teacher │ │ teacher_courses │ │ Course │ │ │ │ (join table) │ │ │ │ id: 1 │◄────────│ teacher_id: 1 │────────►│ id: 1 │ │ Smith │ │ course_id: 1 │ │ CS101 │ └──────────┘ │ teacher_id: 1 │ │ │ ▲ │ course_id: 2 │ │ id: 2 │ │ └─────────────────┘ │ CS102 │ │ └─────────┘ └───────────────────────────────────────────────┘
One Teacher can teach MANY courses One Course can have MANY teachers
4. Many-to-Many Through Relationship (Student ↔ Course via Enrollment) ┌─────────┐ ┌─────────────────────┐ ┌─────────┐ │ Student │ │ Enrollment │ │ Course │ │ │ │ (through table) │ │ │ │ id: 1 │◄─────│ student_id: 1 │─────►│ id: 1 │ │ John │ │ course_id: 1 │ │ CS101 │ └─────────┘ │ grade: "A" │ └─────────┘ │ enrollment_date │ │ enrolled_by (FK) │ └─────────────────────┘
"Through" model allows extra fields (grade, date, enrolled_by)
5. PostgreSQL vs SQLite ┌──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐ │ SQLite PostgreSQL │ ├──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ Storage │ Single file │ Server process │ │ Concurrency │ Limited │ Excellent │ │ Data integrity │ Good │ Excellent │ │ Production ready │ No │ Yes │ │ Performance │ Small apps │ Large apps │ │ Features │ Basic │ Advanced │ └──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
Your system uses PostgreSQL = Production-ready! ✅
═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# PostgreSQL Database Setup Guide
## Prerequisites 1. Install PostgreSQL on your machine - Download from: https://www.postgresql.org/download/ - During installation, remember the password you set for the 'postgres' user
## Step 1: Create Database
### Option A: Using pgAdmin (GUI) 1. Open pgAdmin 2. Right-click on "Databases" → "Create" → "Database" 3. Name: `student_management_db` 4. Click "Save"
### Option B: Using psql (Command Line) ```bash # Open Command Prompt or PowerShell psql -U postgres
# Inside psql, run: CREATE DATABASE student_management_db;
# Exit psql \q ```
## Step 2: Update Django Settings
Open `StudentManagementSystem/settings.py` and update the DATABASES configuration:
```python DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql', 'NAME': 'student_management_db', 'USER': 'postgres', # Your PostgreSQL username 'PASSWORD': 'your_actual_password', # Replace with your PostgreSQL password 'HOST': 'localhost', # Or your PostgreSQL server IP 'PORT': '5432', # Default PostgreSQL port } } ```
**Important:** Replace `'your_actual_password'` with your actual PostgreSQL password!
## Step 3: Run Migrations
Since we changed the database structure, we need to create fresh migrations:
```bash # Delete old migration files (keep __init__.py) # Manually delete: students/migrations/0001_initial.py
# Create new migrations python manage.py makemigrations
# Apply migrations to PostgreSQL python manage.py migrate
# Create a superuser for admin access python manage.py createsuperuser ```
## Step 4: Test Connection
```bash # Start the development server python manage.py runserver
# Visit: http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/ ```
## Troubleshooting
### Error: "connection refused" - Make sure PostgreSQL service is running - Windows: Check Services → PostgreSQL should be running
### Error: "authentication failed" - Double-check your password in settings.py - Verify the username (default is 'postgres')
### Error: "database does not exist" - Create the database using pgAdmin or psql (see Step 1)
### Error: "psycopg2 not installed" - Run: `pip install psycopg2-binary`
## Security Note
**Never commit your database password to version control!**
Consider using environment variables:
1. Install python-decouple: `pip install python-decouple` 2. Create a `.env` file in project root: ``` DB_NAME=student_management_db DB_USER=postgres DB_PASSWORD=your_actual_password DB_HOST=localhost DB_PORT=5432 ``` 3. Add `.env` to `.gitignore` 4. Update settings.py: ```python from decouple import config
DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql', 'NAME': config('DB_NAME'), 'USER': config('DB_USER'), 'PASSWORD': config('DB_PASSWORD'), 'HOST': config('DB_HOST'), 'PORT': config('DB_PORT'), } } ```

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# ✅ ISSUE FIXED - Server is Running!
## Problem The root URL (`/`) was not defined, causing a 404 error when visiting http://127.0.0.1:8000/
## Solution Applied Added a home/welcome endpoint that: - Displays API information - Lists all available endpoints - Shows HTTP methods for each endpoint - Provides links to documentation
## ✅ Your Server is Running!
**URL:** http://127.0.0.1:8000/
When you visit the root URL, you'll see: ```json { "message": "Welcome to Student Management System API", "version": "1.0", "endpoints": { "authentication": {...}, "students": {...}, "courses": {...}, "enrollment": {...}, "teacher": {...} }, "admin_panel": "/admin/", "documentation": "See COMPLETE_GUIDE.md for detailed documentation" } ```
## Quick Test Commands
### 1. Visit Home Page Open browser: http://127.0.0.1:8000/
### 2. Access Admin Panel http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/
### 3. Test API Endpoints
#### Register a Student ```bash curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/auth/register/student/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"username\":\"john_doe\",\"email\":\"john@test.com\",\"password\":\"testpass123\",\"first_name\":\"John\",\"last_name\":\"Doe\",\"age\":20,\"gpa\":3.5}" ```
#### Get JWT Token ```bash curl -X POST http://127.0.0.1:8000/auth/token/ -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"username\":\"john_doe\",\"password\":\"testpass123\"}" ```
#### View All Students ```bash curl http://127.0.0.1:8000/students/ ```
#### View All Courses ```bash curl http://127.0.0.1:8000/courses/ ```
## Summary of Changes
1. **Added `home()` view** in `students/views.py` - Returns API documentation in JSON format - Lists all available endpoints
2. **Added home URL pattern** in `students/urls.py` - `path('', views.home, name='home')` - Handles requests to the root URL
3. **REST Framework permissions** already set to `AllowAny` - Allows access without authentication for testing
## Current Setup Status
- ✅ PostgreSQL connected (database: StudentSystem) - ✅ JWT authentication configured - ✅ Models created (Student, Teacher, Course, Enrollment, EnrollmentRequest) - ✅ All endpoints working - ✅ Admin panel available - ✅ Home page displaying API info
## Next Steps
1. **Create admin user** (if not done): ```bash python manage.py createsuperuser ```
2. **Add test data via admin panel**: - Visit http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/ - Add some courses - Create teachers and assign courses - Create students
3. **Test the workflow**: - Student requests enrollment - Teacher approves/rejects - Teacher updates grades
## Documentation Files
- **COMPLETE_GUIDE.md** - Full API documentation with theory - **QUICKSTART.md** - Quick setup steps - **DATABASE_SETUP.md** - PostgreSQL configuration - **THIS FILE** - Issue resolution summary
---
**Your Student Management System is ready to use!**
Visit: http://127.0.0.1:8000/ to see your API documentation.

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
""" Django settings for StudentManagementSystem project.
Generated by 'django-admin startproject' using Django 5.2.8.
For more information on this file, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/topics/settings/
For the full list of settings and their values, see https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/ref/settings/ """
from pathlib import Path from datetime import timedelta
# Build paths inside the project like this: BASE_DIR / 'subdir'. BASE_DIR = Path(__file__).resolve().parent.parent
# Quick-start development settings - unsuitable for production # See https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/howto/deployment/checklist/
# SECURITY WARNING: keep the secret key used in production secret! SECRET_KEY = 'django-insecure--*5$hsxwnj4!xdtuhz3__4&28sc@oyb59wt52^qge*t9f6)1c%'
# SECURITY WARNING: don't run with debug turned on in production! DEBUG = True
ALLOWED_HOSTS = []
# Application definition
INSTALLED_APPS = [ 'django.contrib.admin', 'django.contrib.auth', 'django.contrib.contenttypes', 'django.contrib.sessions', 'django.contrib.messages', 'django.contrib.staticfiles', 'rest_framework', 'rest_framework_simplejwt', 'students' ]
MIDDLEWARE = [ 'django.middleware.security.SecurityMiddleware', 'django.contrib.sessions.middleware.SessionMiddleware', 'django.middleware.common.CommonMiddleware', 'django.middleware.csrf.CsrfViewMiddleware', 'django.contrib.auth.middleware.AuthenticationMiddleware', 'django.contrib.messages.middleware.MessageMiddleware', 'django.middleware.clickjacking.XFrameOptionsMiddleware', ]
ROOT_URLCONF = 'StudentManagementSystem.urls'
TEMPLATES = [ { 'BACKEND': 'django.template.backends.django.DjangoTemplates', 'DIRS': [BASE_DIR / 'templates'] , 'APP_DIRS': True, 'OPTIONS': { 'context_processors': [ 'django.template.context_processors.request', 'django.contrib.auth.context_processors.auth', 'django.contrib.messages.context_processors.messages', ], }, }, ]
WSGI_APPLICATION = 'StudentManagementSystem.wsgi.application'
# Database # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/ref/settings/#databases
DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql', 'NAME': 'StudentSystem', 'USER': 'postgres', 'PASSWORD': 'Nour@1205', 'HOST': 'localhost', 'PORT': '5432', } }
# Password validation # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/ref/settings/#auth-password-validators
AUTH_PASSWORD_VALIDATORS = [ { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.UserAttributeSimilarityValidator', }, { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.MinimumLengthValidator', }, { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.CommonPasswordValidator', }, { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.NumericPasswordValidator', }, ]
# Internationalization # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/topics/i18n/
LANGUAGE_CODE = 'en-us'
TIME_ZONE = 'UTC'
USE_I18N = True
USE_TZ = True
# Static files (CSS, JavaScript, Images) # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/howto/static-files/
STATIC_URL = 'static/'
# Default primary key field type # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/ref/settings/#default-auto-field
DEFAULT_AUTO_FIELD = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
REST_FRAMEWORK = { 'DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION_CLASSES': [ 'rest_framework_simplejwt.authentication.JWTAuthentication', 'rest_framework.authentication.SessionAuthentication', ], 'DEFAULT_PERMISSION_CLASSES': [ 'rest_framework.permissions.AllowAny', ], }
SIMPLE_JWT = { 'ACCESS_TOKEN_LIFETIME': timedelta(hours=1), 'REFRESH_TOKEN_LIFETIME': timedelta(days=7), 'ROTATE_REFRESH_TOKENS': True, 'BLACKLIST_AFTER_ROTATION': True, 'AUTH_HEADER_TYPES': ('Bearer',), 'AUTH_TOKEN_CLASSES': ('rest_framework_simplejwt.tokens.AccessToken',), }

# Password validation # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/ref/settings/#auth-password-validators
AUTH_PASSWORD_VALIDATORS = [ { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.UserAttributeSimilarityValidator', }, { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.MinimumLengthValidator', }, { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.CommonPasswordValidator', }, { 'NAME': 'django.contrib.auth.password_validation.NumericPasswordValidator', }, ]
# Internationalization # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/topics/i18n/
LANGUAGE_CODE = 'en-us'

USE_I18N = True

# Static files (CSS, JavaScript, Images) # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/howto/static-files/
STATIC_URL = 'static/'
# Default primary key field type # https://docs.djangoproject.com/en/5.2/ref/settings/#default-auto-field
DEFAULT_AUTO_FIELD = 'django.db.models.BigAutoField'
REST_FRAMEWORK = { 'DEFAULT_AUTHENTICATION_CLASSES': [ 'rest_framework_simplejwt.authentication.JWTAuthentication', 'rest_framework.authentication.SessionAuthentication', ], 'DEFAULT_PERMISSION_CLASSES': [ 'rest_framework.permissions.AllowAny', ], }
SIMPLE_JWT = { 'ACCESS_TOKEN_LIFETIME': timedelta(hours=1), 'REFRESH_TOKEN_LIFETIME': timedelta(days=7), 'ROTATE_REFRESH_TOKENS': True, 'BLACKLIST_AFTER_ROTATION': True, 'AUTH_HEADER_TYPES': ('Bearer',), 'AUTH_TOKEN_CLASSES': ('rest_framework_simplejwt.tokens.AccessToken',), }

option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
from django.db import models from django.contrib.auth.models import User
class Course(models.Model): name = models.CharField(max_length=100) code = models.CharField(max_length=20, unique=True) description = models.TextField(blank=True) credits = models.IntegerField(default=3) created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
def __str__(self): return f'{self.code} - {self.name}'
class Teacher(models.Model): user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='teacher_profile') first_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) last_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) subject = models.CharField(max_length=50) courses = models.ManyToManyField(Course, related_name='teachers', blank=True) created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
def __str__(self): return f'Teacher: {self.first_name} {self.last_name}'
class Student(models.Model): user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='student_profile') first_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) last_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) age = models.IntegerField() gpa = models.FloatField() enrolled_courses = models.ManyToManyField(Course, through='Enrollment', related_name='enrolled_students') created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
def __str__(self): return f'Student: {self.first_name} {self.last_name}'
class Enrollment(models.Model): student = models.ForeignKey(Student, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollments') course = models.ForeignKey(Course, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollments') enrolled_by = models.ForeignKey(Teacher, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True, blank=True, related_name='students_enrolled') enrollment_date = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True) grade = models.CharField(max_length=2, blank=True, null=True)
class Meta: unique_together = ['student', 'course']
def __str__(self): return f'{self.student} enrolled in {self.course}'
class EnrollmentRequest(models.Model): STATUS_CHOICES = [ ('pending', 'Pending'), ('approved', 'Approved'), ('rejected', 'Rejected'), ]
student = models.ForeignKey(Student, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollment_requests') course = models.ForeignKey(Course, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollment_requests') status = models.CharField(max_length=10, choices=STATUS_CHOICES, default='pending') requested_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True) reviewed_by = models.ForeignKey(Teacher, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True, blank=True, related_name='reviewed_requests') reviewed_at = models.DateTimeField(null=True, blank=True) notes = models.TextField(blank=True)
class Meta: unique_together = ['student', 'course'] ordering = ['-requested_at']
def __str__(self): return f'{self.student} - {self.course} ({self.status})'

option.value:
from django.db import models from django.contrib.auth.models import User
class Course(models.Model): name = models.CharField(max_length=100) code = models.CharField(max_length=20, unique=True) description = models.TextField(blank=True) credits = models.IntegerField(default=3) created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
def __str__(self): return f'{self.code} - {self.name}'
class Teacher(models.Model): user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='teacher_profile') first_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) last_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) subject = models.CharField(max_length=50) courses = models.ManyToManyField(Course, related_name='teachers', blank=True) created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
def __str__(self): return f'Teacher: {self.first_name} {self.last_name}'
class Student(models.Model): user = models.OneToOneField(User, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='student_profile') first_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) last_name = models.CharField(max_length=50) age = models.IntegerField() gpa = models.FloatField() enrolled_courses = models.ManyToManyField(Course, through='Enrollment', related_name='enrolled_students') created_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True)
def __str__(self): return f'Student: {self.first_name} {self.last_name}'
class Enrollment(models.Model): student = models.ForeignKey(Student, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollments') course = models.ForeignKey(Course, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollments') enrolled_by = models.ForeignKey(Teacher, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True, blank=True, related_name='students_enrolled') enrollment_date = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True) grade = models.CharField(max_length=2, blank=True, null=True)
class Meta: unique_together = ['student', 'course']
def __str__(self): return f'{self.student} enrolled in {self.course}'
class EnrollmentRequest(models.Model): STATUS_CHOICES = [ ('pending', 'Pending'), ('approved', 'Approved'), ('rejected', 'Rejected'), ]
student = models.ForeignKey(Student, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollment_requests') course = models.ForeignKey(Course, on_delete=models.CASCADE, related_name='enrollment_requests') status = models.CharField(max_length=10, choices=STATUS_CHOICES, default='pending') requested_at = models.DateTimeField(auto_now_add=True) reviewed_by = models.ForeignKey(Teacher, on_delete=models.SET_NULL, null=True, blank=True, related_name='reviewed_requests') reviewed_at = models.DateTimeField(null=True, blank=True) notes = models.TextField(blank=True)
class Meta: unique_together = ['student', 'course'] ordering = ['-requested_at']
def __str__(self): return f'{self.student} - {self.course} ({self.status})'

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
from django.contrib import admin from django.urls import path from django.urls.conf import include from rest_framework_simplejwt.views import TokenObtainPairView, TokenRefreshView from . import views
urlpatterns = [ path('', views.home, name='home'),
path('auth/token/', TokenObtainPairView.as_view(), name='token_obtain_pair'), path('auth/token/refresh/', TokenRefreshView.as_view(), name='token_refresh'), path('auth/register/student/', views.register_student, name='register_student'), path('auth/register/teacher/', views.register_teacher, name='register_teacher'), path('auth/login/', views.user_login, name='user_login'), path('auth/logout/', views.user_logout, name='user_logout'),
path('students/', views.get_students, name='get_students'), path('students/add/', views.add_student, name='add_student'), path('students/delete/<int:id>/', views.delete_student, name='delete_student'), path('students/update/<int:id>/', views.update_student, name='update_student'),
path('courses/', views.get_courses, name='get_courses'),
path('enrollment/request/', views.student_request_enrollment, name='student_request_enrollment'),
path('teacher/requests/<int:teacher_id>/', views.teacher_pending_requests, name='teacher_pending_requests'), path('teacher/request/<int:request_id>/approve/', views.teacher_approve_request, name='teacher_approve_request'), path('teacher/request/<int:request_id>/reject/', views.teacher_reject_request, name='teacher_reject_request'), path('teacher/enroll/', views.teacher_enroll_student, name='teacher_enroll_student'), path('teacher/<int:teacher_id>/course/<int:course_id>/students/', views.teacher_course_students, name='teacher_course_students'), path('teacher/enrollment/<int:enrollment_id>/grade/', views.teacher_update_grade, name='teacher_update_grade'), ]

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
from django.contrib import admin from django.urls import path from django.urls.conf import include from rest_framework_simplejwt.views import TokenObtainPairView, TokenRefreshView from . import views
urlpatterns = [ path('', views.home, name='home'),
path('auth/token/', TokenObtainPairView.as_view(), name='token_obtain_pair'), path('auth/token/refresh/', TokenRefreshView.as_view(), name='token_refresh'), path('auth/register/student/', views.register_student, name='register_student'), path('auth/register/teacher/', views.register_teacher, name='register_teacher'), path('auth/login/', views.user_login, name='user_login'), path('auth/logout/', views.user_logout, name='user_logout'),
path('students/', views.get_students, name='get_students'), path('students/add/', views.add_student, name='add_student'), path('students/delete/<int:id>/', views.delete_student, name='delete_student'), path('students/update/<int:id>/', views.update_student, name='update_student'),
path('courses/', views.get_courses, name='get_courses'),
path('enrollment/request/', views.student_request_enrollment, name='student_request_enrollment'),
path('teacher/requests/<int:teacher_id>/', views.teacher_pending_requests, name='teacher_pending_requests'), path('teacher/request/<int:request_id>/approve/', views.teacher_approve_request, name='teacher_approve_request'), path('teacher/request/<int:request_id>/reject/', views.teacher_reject_request, name='teacher_reject_request'), path('teacher/enroll/', views.teacher_enroll_student, name='teacher_enroll_student'), path('teacher/<int:teacher_id>/course/<int:course_id>/students/', views.teacher_course_students, name='teacher_course_students'), path('teacher/enrollment/<int:enrollment_id>/grade/', views.teacher_update_grade, name='teacher_update_grade'), ]
